channel.title: Version 5.16 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.16.2 (2023-06-10) Enhancements [feature] theme: revamp 404 page #566 5.16.1 (2023-06-09) Enhancements [feature] theme: add deprecation warnings #565 Fixes [bug] mermaid: allow for YAML frontmatter inside of graph #564 [bug] alias: fix redirect URLs in case of empty BaseURL #562
